description: Try our easy to follow Tamar Valley Dairy Sweet And Creamy Baked Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tamar Valley Dairy Sweet And Creamy Baked Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tub Tamar Valley Dairy Sweet & Creamy, room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Base Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius
Combine biscuits and butter and form into the bottom of a spring form pan or tart pan.
Bake the biscuit base for 10 minutes and then remove from oven and let it cool down to room temperature.
Filling Turn the oven down to 160 degrees Celsius
In a mixing bowl or bench top mixer, lightly beat the eggs before mixing with Tamar Valley Dairy Sweet & Creamy, vanilla and lemon zest. Combine everything until smooth.
Put the filling into the baked crust, lightly tap the pan once or twice on the counter to level the filing a bit, then back for 35-40 minutes. The cheesecake will be just set, the edges puffy.
Cool on a cooling rack for 1-2 hours, then place the pan in the refrigerator to cool and set completely for a minimum of 4 hours.
